body.p: The undersigned, rectors of the Chicago Greek Churches, hereby, publicaly state, unequivocally, that we never recognized in the past, nor do we now, as spiritual or Ecclesiastical authority, the self-styled Bishops, agents or representatives of the corporation, "Greek Archdiocese of North and South America" organized and operated under the statutes of the State of New York.

We furthermore state that we never had, nor have now, any relationship whatever with the aboved referred to corporation, their representatives, or agents. That the said corporation and the self-styled Bishops, agents or representatives never held, nor hold now, any jurisdicion, either spiritual, Ecclesiastical, or any similar relation over us
